1238310.name: Blacksad Soundtrack
1238310.description:
Official Blacksad OST


Discover or re-discover the acclaimed beautiful jazzy music that deepens the noir tone of the game! From light tunes to intense musical outburst, journey along John Blacksad in the streets of 1950's New York.

It is a raining night, and the town is dangerous, even for a hard-boiled detective.

22 tracks from Juan Miguel Martin + an amazing main theme by Inon Zur, composer for Fallout, Dragon Age, Prince of Persia, and Syberia!
